oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Pemberton Oak, located near Bristol, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Pemberton Oak, located near Bristol, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Trees; Historic sites
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. John Pemberton and company met under the "Pemberton Oak" near Bristol, assembled with Col. Isaac Shelby and other Overmountain Men, and marched to fight in the Battle of King's Mountain, 1780, in South Carolina during the Revolutionary War.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
